title: [Tuts Plus] Drawing Fantasy Creatures Digitally Video Tutorial-K
description:
[Tuts Plus] Drawing Fantasy Creatures Digitally Video Tutorial-KTR
==================================================================



PUBLISHER....: Tuts Plus
LANGUAGE......: ENGLISH 
AUTHOR.......: Kirk Nelson
LEVEL.........: ADVANCED
RELEASE DATE..: 2014.09.29
RUNTIME......: 2.2 hours



About this course::

Welcome to Drawing Fantasy Creatures Digitally. This course will teach you how to draw creatures that do not exist in reality. The element of fantasy presents some challenges, such as lack of photo references, but on the other hand we have the opportunity for more creative expression. This course takes you through the workflow for creating creatures of pure imagination using Adobe Photoshop. The instruction blends traditional drawing techniques with modern digital workflows. The project focus is on drawing two fantasy creatures: a centaur and a dragon.


Topics include:

1.Introduction
1.1Introduction
1.2Tools and Resources


2.Drawing a Centaur in Adobe Photoshop
2.1Photo Sketching
2.2Developing the Base Sketch
2.3Draw It Out
2.4Adding Accessories
2.5Light and Shadow
2.6Final Effects


3.Drawing a Dragon
3.1Study and Sketch a Dragon
3.2Connected Solids
3.3Lines and Forms
3.4Dragon Head and Eyes
3.5Dragon Feet
3.6Dragon Wings
3.7Dragon Skin and Scales
3.8Dragon Fire1


4.Conclusion
4.1Conclusion
